name: Story Storage
description:
I want to share all of my little ideas for art, games, stories, comics, zines, etc. with the world... but sometimes, it's hard to finish a project, or even get started. Making things is as fun as it is difficult. These concepts sit, unused, and wish for nothing but to be appreciated.

I invite you to take a look around one of my story storage rooms, where I keep my creations that have yet to be created.
